data.actual_result: The site 'reloads' going back to the mobile version of the site
data.expected_result: If the site has a Desktop site, it will load the Desktop site
data.short_description: Request Desktop Site button in the in-app browser isn't changing User Agent [Most likely iOS 10 specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the in-app browser selected - Post a link to a website that has a mobile version and a desktop version (like Discord's website) - Open the website in the in-app browser - When the website loads click the share button - Click the Request Desktop Site button (in bottom bar of icons)
